titles.title: To direct the Architect of the Capitol to enter into a contract to revise the statue commemorating women's suffrage located in the rotunda of the United States Capitol to include a likeness of Sojourner Truth.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/16/2002--Introduced. Requires the Architect of the Capitol to enter into a contract to revise the statue commemorating women's suffrage located in the rotunda of the United States Capitol (known as the Portrait Monument) to include a likeness of Sojourner Truth.
